text: Kadala Mage (Son of the Sea) is a 2006 Indian Tulu language film directed by Praveen Jain and produced by Sadhana N Shetty, starring Bhavya, Diganth, Soorya, Sarita Jain, Rajesh Bantwal, Bhojaraj Vamanjoor, Lakshman Kumar Mallur, Sarojini Shetty and Ila Vitla in the lead roles. == Cast == == Soundtrack == ==References== Category:2006 films Category:Indian films Category:Tulu-language films
title: Kadala Mage
